releases.notes: This release exchanges the master branch for the main branch. All branches are currently merged. All pull requests are merged as well. This is a new baseline and marks a change in the way releases will be managed, with frequency changing to a regular biweekly schedule.

features.description: Enable cache configuration of resouces in workflows

bugs.description: Merged pull request to fix unauthenticated navigation of public pages
Fixes a problem when searching a field in a GrapheneDataGrid whose type has a default template that is not defined explicitly on the field instance.
Allow Api's in the GrapheneApiGateway be configured to have no (0) required parameters and handle that scenario in the gateway itself and the generated documentation as well.
Fix 'user' type field configuration by not parsing the search field unless it is populated - this fixes a current problem introduced in the last release but a better pattern should be defined
